motorola-xoom-with-wi-fi.description: Motorola XOOM with Wi-Fi has a super-powerful dual-core processor and Android™ 3.0 (Honeycomb) — the Android platform designed specifically for tablets. With its 10.1-inch HD widescreen display, you’ll enjoy HD video in a thin, light, powerful and upgradeable tablet.
motorola-xoom-with-wi-fi.name: Motorola XOOM™ with Wi-Fi
